data.title: Author Visits — M.M.Vaughan
data.text:
There’s nothing I love more than meeting young readers and writers!

As a former teacher with over ten years experience in both mainstream schooling and special education (autism and emotional & behavioral), I am comfortable and confident talking and working with readers of all ages.

My visits can take the form of talks or workshops - all include interaction with the audience. Talks are generally around the theme of 'Tips for Writing', but can be tailored to specific needs. Recent examples include 'Writing Science Fiction', 'Developing Characters in Your Writing', 'Diversity in Writing', 'Story Structure', 'Get Inspired To Write!'.

I also offer Skype visits. Please contact me for further information.
